pages.title: Support
pages.text: Some machines are equipped with Artificial Intelligence which allows them to analyze their own processes to determine their own efficiency.$(br2)These data sets, known as Support Points, can be used in other machines to create more intelligent machinery.

pages.title: Support
pages.text: Support points are stored in flash drives or transported via support cables. $(br2)Flash drives can either be loaded with SP in the machines themselves or you can create a $(thing)Flash Server$() which can hold 4 flash drives and connect SP producing and using machines to them.
